mapper.select: select u.user_id from t_user_account u join t_oauth o on u.user_id = o.user_id where o.oauth_platform_name = #{platformName} and o.oauth_platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.update: update t_user_account set user_grade = #{userGrade}, user_modify_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.profile_id AS profileId, u.user_nick_name AS name, p.profile_image_url AS profileImg, u.user_grade AS grade, p.profile_intro AS intro, GROUP_CONCAT(k.keyword_name) AS keywords FROM t_user_account u INNER JOIN t_profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN t_m_user_keyword muk ON u.user_id = muk.user_id LEFT JOIN t_keyword k ON muk.keyword_id = k.keyword_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY u.user_id
